post:
**Hi everyone!**
 
I want to introduce our dedicated server offer specially created for LET members.
 
*    Hardware: **Xeon 2x E5-2420 (12 cores) / 32 GB RAM / 4x2TB HDD or 2x120GB SSD**
*    Bandwidth: 10TB / 100Mbps
*    Location: EvoSwitch NL/ Haarlem, Netherlands (LeaseWeb)
*    OS: Linux variants, Windows (SPLA)
*    RAID: Hardware + BBU
*    Delivery time: 3 business hours
*    IPv4: 1 included (32 max)
 
Special price: **59 EUR / month**  [**Order link**](https://ru-tld.ru/en/aktsionnyie-servery/#5440)

To get this special LET price, please use promo code **LowEndTalk** during the order process. The price is recurring.

**Upgrades:**

* 100Mbps unmetered  **+15 EUR**
* 1 Gbit port (metered) **+10 EUR**
* 2x E5-2620 CPU **+10 EUR**
* 2x E5-2620v2 CPU **+20 EUR**

Other upgrades are also possible. Please contact us for the offer.

If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask me here or use online chat on our website or if you prefer email: [sale@ru-tld.ru](mailto:sale@ru-tld.ru)
